Detailed Description

wxSkinCheckBox is a checkbox created through a skin

wxSkinCheckBox has the states checked/unchecked and emits the same events wxCheckBox does.

Member Function Documentation

virtual void wxSkinCheckBox::DrawCustom ( wxDC &  dc  )  [virtual]

Overwrite this method in derived classses.

This method will be called after the standard drawing action has been completed. This allows to do some non-standard drawing in dervied controls.

Implements wxSkinWindow.
